PathOfBuilding.Notes:
shaper/elder/sirus get lvl 95 ?
crafting :
phasing jewel : slam fire res? staff : 6L + slam res // fated connections is 4ex boots : remove life -> res / + add speed + cannot be chilled / cannot be frozen helmet : craft light radius is based on ES rather than life
